price: 65. « Ne gémissez point aujourd’hui, car vous n’aurez contre Nous aucun secours.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
